name: dish
description: d?ish is a dlike language that transpiles to asmjs (I hope)

scripts._vscode_build: coffee -bc ./src/dish.coffee && coffee -bc ./test && node ./src/dish.js test/entity.d --template test/test.tpl.js --output test/entity.js && node ./src/dish.js test/pool.d --template test/test.tpl.js --output test/pool.js && tsc -p ./jsconfig.json
scripts._vscode_test: coffee -bc ./src/dish.coffee && coffee -bc ./test && node ./src/dish.js test/test1.d --template test/test.tpl.js --output test/test1.js && node ./src/dish.js test/test2.d --template test/test.tpl.js --output test/test2.js && node ./src/dish.js test/test-twister.d --template test/test.tpl.js --output test/test-twister.js && tsc -p ./jsconfig.json

author: darkoverlordofdata
